signature: int read(byte[], int, int) throws IOException

enhanced_by.reason: The fill() method is invoked to ensure the buffer is populated before reading from it.
The closeIfDone(int) method is invoked to handle the completion of reading from the underlying InputStream.
The available() method provides information about the number of bytes that can be read, which can be used to construct assertions about the read() method's behavior.
The baseReadFully() method indicates if the underlying InputStream has been read fully, which can be used to assert the state after reading.
